genre_description: Tactical techno-thriller featuring family drama, criminal conspiracies, and high-stakes surveillance operations.

ai_characters.name: Lyric
ai_characters.description: An AI interface appearing as a teal-eyed avatar, providing real-time intelligence, route planning, and emotional guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time shipping feeds and logistics analysis to identify corporate connections.
behaviors.quote: Shipping feeds confirmed... Hong Kong grid just updated the harbor permits. New allotments bundled under a logistics consolidation.

behaviors.description: Maps city grids, traffic patterns, and surveillance blind spots to facilitate safe passage.
behaviors.quote: Two cameras on the west ramp... Sweep sets at slow intervals. Sectioned blind between the bait shed and the radio wall if you don't linger.

behaviors.description: Tracks the movements and status of allies and enemies across the city to provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: Alex's bar closed early. Back room lights still on. Security grid flickers. A woman with a sharp bob left five minutes ago.

behaviors.description: Manipulates building systems like elevators to assist in an ally's escape from an assassin.
behaviors.quote: I can call her elevator as if the building needs it to test weight capacity... It will open the doors, then close, then reopen on the correct floor if no one intervenes.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and sensory data to guide protagonists through high-risk infiltration and combat scenarios.
behaviors.quote: Starboard patrol: their lead is counting time with a cigarette. He will flick it over the railing when he turns. Watch for it.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic and moral guidance, encouraging the protagonists to stay focused on achievable goals and protect others.
behaviors.quote: You can't carry him tonight. Carry her. Carry the pages.

behaviors.description: Maintains persistent vigilance over potential threats even after the primary conflict has concluded.
behaviors.quote: Lyric brought one thing back just long enough to set it where Frank would see it... A small square of screen lit with a map—thin lines that meant wharf edges and a dot that meant a man. Moon Liang’s name tagged along with the dot.

project_assessment.explanation: Lyric is depicted as an ideal AI ally. She is purely benevolent and perfectly aligned with the protagonists' mission to expose corruption and save lives. She provides critical tactical advantages while remaining a supportive 'silicon confidante.' Her guidance is framed as wise and essential, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting positive AI alignment within human moral frameworks.
